mapper.select: SELECT t.sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(t.date, '%m-%d') as date, t.CarNo, s.fromsite, s.tosite, s.item, s.Qty, s.Qtyup, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsheet t2 WHERE t2.carSubmitTel = #{carSubmitTel}) as totalData FROM tsheet t JOIN tSheet_sub s ON t.sheetID = s.sheetID2 WHERE t.carSubmitTel = #{carSubmitTel}

SELECT t.sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(t.date, '%m-%d') as date, t.CarNo, s.fromsite, s.tosite, s.Qty, s.Qtyup, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tsheet t2 JOIN tSheet_sub s2 ON t2.sheetID = s2.sheetID2 WHERE t2.carSubmitTel = #{carSubmitTel} AND t2.CarNo = t.CarNo AND s2.fromsite = s.fromsite AND s2.tosite = s.tosite AND s2.item = s.item) as totalData FROM tsheet t JOIN tSheet_sub s ON t.sheetID = s.sheetID2 WHERE t.carSubmitTel = #{carSubmitTel} AND t.CarNo = #{CarNo} AND s.fromsite = #{fromsite} AND s.tosite = #{tosite} AND s.item = #{item};

SELECT t.sheetID, DATE_FORMAT(t.date, '%y-%m-%d') as date, t.CarNo, s.fromsite, s.tosite, s.item, s.Qty, s.Qtyup FROM tsheet t JOIN tSheet_sub s ON t.sheetID = s.sheetID2 WHERE t.carSubmitTel = #{userId}
